name: Quick! Choose Your Weapon!
description:
This was our game for Ludum Dare 32, as well as our teams first finished project together! Grab some controllers and a couple of friends and have fun!

Watch a quick gameplay video here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9k1Si9iyWuw

The music is by OpenGameArt.org user Yubatake and is available here: http://opengameart.org/content/rainbow-rush

Everything else was done by the team at http://www.ILoveToJam.com
